resources.string: Make sure that the client device is paired with this one.\n\nServer will run as long as Bluetooth is enabled. Images sent by the client will appear below.
App has insufficient permissions to start server or does not support BLE.
Server MAC address (if blank, matches anything)
If connecting to another Android device, make sure the two are paired.\n\nTurn off your screen and use the volume up and down keys to send images to the server.
